name: Polterheist (itch) (CralDev)
description:
Your time at Cral Incorporated has come to an untimely end. Find your way through the offices and meet past coworkers along the way to exact your deathly revenge.

A fun spooky adventure game created for the LD45 Jam.

Hope you all enjoy!

Cral.

Change Log: (Only on HTML5 version)

08/10/2019 - Very minor bug fix to avoid soft locking at the janitor!
